infotexts.entitydescription.monster_ultra: Flavor Profile: Light Refreshing Citrus. Unleash the Ultra Beast!
infotexts.entitydescription.monster_ultra_paradise: Flavor Profile: Kiwi Lime with a hint of Cucumber. Unleash The Ultra Beast!
infotexts.entitydescription.monster_original_green: Flavor Profile: Sweet and Salty - It tastes like Monster!. Unleash The Beast
infotexts.entitydescription.monster_pacific_punch: Flavor Profile: Classic Fruit Punch. Unleash The Salty Beast!
infotexts.entitydescription.monster_pipeline_punch: Flavor Profile: Passion Fruit, Orange, and Guava. Unleash The Beast
infotexts.entitydescription.monster_juiced_ripper: Flavor Profile: Tropical Juices. The Juice is Loose…
infotexts.entitydescription.monster_mango_juice: Flavor Profile: Juicy Mango. Crazy good taste with just enough of that Monster magic to keep the party going for days…
infotexts.entitydescription.monster_ultra_violet: Flavor Profile: Light Citrus and Grape. Unleash The Ultra Beast!
